ModelTest-NG
============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which ModelTest-NG installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using ModelTest-NG, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load ModelTest-NG/0.1.7-gompi-2021b
```
